des: "I got this recipe from a friend who was living in Ecuador. Quinoa was a staple of her diet there; it is a great source of protein."
ins: Bring the quinoa and chicken broth to a boil in a saucepan; cover, reduce heat to low, and simmer until the moisture is completely absorbed, about 15 minutes. Remove from heat; stir the pesto through the quinoa. Fold the tomato into the mixture. Season with salt and pepper to serve.
